name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kid Goku Dragon Ball Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step back into the world of Dragon Ball with this exciting new tab extension featuring Kid Goku.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension transforms your new tab page with vibrant images of Goku as a young warrior, full of energy and determination. Featuring high-quality artwork, you’ll enjoy visuals of Kid Goku in his early adventures as he embarks on epic quests, faces strong foes, and makes new friends.

Every time you open a new tab, you’ll be greeted with scenes from his childhood, paired with motivational quotes that capture his innocent yet fierce spirit. Whether you’re a fan of Goku’s early days or just love the nostalgia of Dragon Ball, this extension brings his youthful energy to your browsing experience.

Bring the unstoppable energy of Kid Goku to your browser and let his courage, determination, and sense of adventure inspire you throughout your day.
